descriptionHtml:
It\'s just ENORMOUS !  Please endorse me.

15 outstanding music in the main menu of Skyrim
The opening music will remain the same as the original. Those who want to play will see no change.
Whoever would afford a nice hearing will remain on the home screen, and listen more.

The maintheme and ...
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cAnQQcIncq0
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q9Dv4Hmf_O8
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wdUW-9JJlCo
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2unSXEPyYKQ
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k0_LChL94bE
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0FLQ4rACE-0
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gyCFuP3rM2w&noredirect=1

And others...

If you want to listen before, you can download the mp3:
http://www.multiupload.nl/RCVFYQYHS0

VERY EASY TO INSTALL:
I recommand to use Nexus mod Manager

MANUAL INSTALL:
1 - Download the file 
2 - uncompress it
2 - paste the file mus_maintheme.xwm in:
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\Music\\special
or
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Music\\special


TO UNINSTALL
Delete the file mus_maintheme.xwm
author: jardindeden
